actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army acting through the Corps of Engineers to relocate the Christina River Dredge Spoil Disposal Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Corps of Engineers, to relocate the disposal site for dredge spoil from the Christina River, Wilmington, Delaware (currently located at Cherry Island) to a Delaware River site between the Wilmington Marine Terminal and Pigeon Point.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army acting through the Corps of Engineers to relocate the Christina River Dredge Spoil Disposal Site.
